languages.text:
The target gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and +5% additional damage for every 10 stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks (rounded up). This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.
If the target uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, they gain +25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Наносимый целью {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на +5, а также еще на +5% дополнительно за каждые 10 уровней тактического преимущества {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастера-тактика{/g}. При этом мастер-тактик теряет половину уровней тактического преимущества с округлением вверх. Эффект суммируется и длится до конца боя.
Если цель совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} до начала следующего хода мастера-тактика, она получает +25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The target gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and +5% additional damage for every 10 stacks of tactical advantage the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their tactical advantage stacks (rounded up). This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.
If the target uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

- The target gains +1 Damage and +1 additional Damage for every 10 stacks of Tactical Advantage the Tactician has. This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat. - If the target uses the Heroic Act before the beginning of the Tactician's next turn, they regain +25 Momentum. - The Tactician loses half of the stacks of Tactical Advantage (rounded up).

The target gains +1 damage and +1 additional damage for every 10 stacks of Tactical Advantage the Tactician has. This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat. If the target uses a heroic act before the beginning of the Tactician's next turn, they regain +25 momentum. The Tactician loses half of their stacks of Tactical Advantage (rounded up).

The target gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and +5% additional damage for every 10 stacks of tactical advantage the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their tactical advantage stacks (rounded up). This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.
If the target uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, they gain +25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

The target gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and +5% additional damage for every 10 stacks of tactical advantage the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their tactical advantage stacks (rounded up). This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.
If the target uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, they gain +25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Наносимый целью {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} увеличивается на +5, а также еще на +5% дополнительно за каждые 10 уровней {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}тактического преимущества{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}мастера-тактика{/g}. При этом мастер-тактик теряет половину уровней {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}тактического преимущества{/g} с округлением вверх. Эффект суммируется и длится до конца боя.
Если цель совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героический акт{/g} до начала следующего хода мастера-тактика, она получает +25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.

Цель получает +1 урон и +1 дополнительный урон за каждые 10 уровней Тактического преимущества тактика. При этом тактик теряет половину уровней Тактического преимущества с округлением вверх. Эффект суммируется и длится до конца боя. Если цель совершает героический акт до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} тактика, она получает +25 моментума.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}每有10层{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}“战术优势”{/g}层数，就可以让目标获得+5%{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}与+5%额外伤害，随后战术专家失去一半的{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}“战术优势”{/g}层数（向上取整）。此效果会叠加，持续至战斗结束。
如果目标在战术专家的下个回合开始前使用了{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}，则会获得25{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}。
languages.original_text:
The target gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and +5% additional damage for every 10 stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks (rounded up). This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.
If the target uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, they gain +25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 战术专家每有10层战术优势，就可以让目标获得+1伤害与+1额外伤害，随后战术专家失去一半的战术优势层数（向上取整）。此效果会叠加，持续至战斗结束。 如果目标在战术专家的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始前使用了{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}，则会恢复25{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}每有10层“战术优势”层数，就可以让目标获得+5%{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}与+5%额外伤害，随后战术专家失去一半的“战术优势”层数（向上取整）。此效果会叠加，持续至战斗结束。
如果目标在战术专家的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始前使用了{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}，则会获得25{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}。

languages.text:
El objetivo gana un +5 % al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y un +5 % adicional al daño por cada 10 acumulaciones de {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Ventaja táctica{/g} que posea el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g}, pero este pierde la mitad de sus acumulaciones de {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Ventaja táctica{/g} (redondeando hacia arriba). Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el final del combate.
Si el objetivo realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} antes de que comience el próximo turno del maestro táctico, obtiene +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The target gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and +5% additional damage for every 10 stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks (rounded up). This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.
If the target uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, they gain +25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo gana un +1 al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y un +1 adicional al daño por cada 10 acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica que posea el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g}, pero este pierde la mitad de sus acumulaciones de Ventaja táctica (redondeando hacia arriba). Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el final del combate. Si el objetivo realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} antes de que comience el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del maestro táctico, recupera +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}.

languages.text:
Das Ziel erhält +5 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und +5 % Zusatzschaden für jeweils 10 Stapel von {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414} Taktischer Vorteil{/g}, über die der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} verfügt. Dafür verliert der Meistertaktiker aber die Hälfte seiner Stapel von {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414} Taktischer Vorteil{/g} (aufgerundet). Dieser Effekt kann gestacked werden und hat bis zum Ende des Kampfes Bestand.
Sollte das Ziel vor Beginn des nächsten Zugs des Meistertaktikers eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} nutzen, erhält es +25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The target gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and +5% additional damage for every 10 stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks (rounded up). This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.
If the target uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, they gain +25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel erhält +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und +1 Zusatzschaden pro 10 Stapel von Taktischer Vorteil, über die der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g} verfügt. Dafür verliert der Meistertaktiker aber die Hälfte seiner Stapel von Taktischer Vorteil (aufgerundet). Dieser Effekt stapelt sich und hat bis zum Ende des Kampfes Bestand. Sollte das Ziel vor Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Meistertaktikers eine {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} nutzen, erlangt es +25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} zurück.

languages.text:
La cible bénéficie de +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et de +5 % de dégâts supplémentaires par tranche de 10 cumuls d'{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Avantage tactique{/g} dont dispose le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g}, mais ce dernier perd alors la moitié de son cumul d'{g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}Avantage tactique{/g} (valeur arrondie au nombre entier supérieur). Cet effet est cumulable et dure jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Si la cible accomplit un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} avant le début du prochain tour du maître tacticien, elle gagne 25 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The target gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and +5% additional damage for every 10 stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks (rounded up). This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.
If the target uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, they gain +25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La cible bénéficie de +1 point de dégâts et de +1 point de dégâts supplémentaire par tranche de 10 cumuls d'Avantage Tactique acquis par le Tacticien, mais celui-ci perd la moitié de son cumul d'Avantage Tactique (valeur arrondie au nombre entier supérieur). Cet effet est cumulable et dure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Si la cible accomplit un {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} avant le début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Tacticien, elle récupère +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g}.

languages.text:
ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+5%、および戦略の達人に付与されている戦術的優位のスタック10ごとに+5%増加する。ただし、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}は戦術的優位のスタックを半分（切り上げ）失う。この効果はスタックし、戦闘終了まで続く。
ターゲットが戦略の達人の次のターン開始前に{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使用した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が+25回復する。
languages.original_text:
The target gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and +5% additional damage for every 10 stacks of tactical advantage the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their tactical advantage stacks (rounded up). This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.
If the target uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, they gain +25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+5%、および戦略の達人に付与されている戦術的優位のスタック10ごとに+5%増加する。ただし、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}は戦術的優位のスタックを半分（切り上げ）失う。この効果はスタックし、戦闘終了まで続く。
ターゲットが戦略の達人の次のターン開始前に{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使用した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が+25回復する。

ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+5%、および戦略の達人に付与されている戦術的優位のスタック10ごとに+5%増加する。ただし、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}は戦術的優位のスタックを半分（切り上げ）失う。この効果は累積し、戦闘終了まで続く。
ターゲットが戦略の達人の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始前に{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使用した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が+25回復する。

languages.text:
Hedefin vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} +%5 ve {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Usta Taktisyen{/g}'in sahip olduğu her 10 {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}taktiksel avantaj{/g} birikimi için de ilave +%5 artar ancak Usta Taktisyen, taktiksel avantaj birikiminin yarısını kaybeder (yukarı yuvarlanır). Bu etki üst üste birikir ve çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
Hedef, Usta Taktisyen'in bir sonraki turu başlamadan önce bir {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g} kullanırsa +25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text:
The target gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and +5% additional damage for every 10 stacks of {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} has, but the Master Tactician loses half of their {g|f:b669fe2c03a240fca1b3b2429ca87414}tactical advantage{/g} stacks (rounded up). This effect stacks and lasts until the end of combat.
If the target uses a {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} before the beginning of the Master Tactician's next turn, they gain +25 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
